Recipe.Nutricious Chilla: Ingredients: , , , , , , , , , , For Nutritious Chilla, , , 1/4 cup, jowar (white millet) flour, , , 1/4 cup, whole wheat flour (gehun ka atta), , , 1/4 cup, ragi (nachni / red millet) flour, , , 1/4 cup, chopped onion, , , 1/4 cup, chopped tomato, , , 2 tbsp finely, chopped coriander (dhania), , , 1/4 tsp, green chilli paste, , , , salt, to taste, , 1 1/4 tsp, oil, for greasing and cooking, , , For Serving, , , null null, None, , , , , , , Heat a non-stick tava (griddle) and grease it with ¼ tsp of oil., Pour a ladleful of the batter on tava (griddle) and spread it evenly to make a 125 mm. (5”) diameter thin circle., , , , , , Cook the chill for 30 to 45 seconds on medium heat., , , , , , , Drizzle a little oil all over the chilla and along the edges to cook the chilla.  Ghee/Butter can be used instead of oil., , , , , , Flip over., , , , , , Cook the other side the same way and press down using a spatula while cooking to get even cooking of the chilla., , , , , , Keep cooking and flipping and your chilla is cooked. If not, it may be an indication of undesirable texture and taste., , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , How to select besan, chana dal flour, bengal gram flour, , , , , , , , , Choose yellow-coloured flour that is clean and free from insects., , , , , , Purchase coarsely or finely ground besan, as desired., , Check the label and buy the freshest stock as it imbibes a rancid smell over time., , It should also be free broken grains of chana dal., , Also make sure that there is no evidence of moisture or lumps formation., , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , How to select onions, , , , , , , , , Choose onions with tightly closed necks that are absolutely dry, avoiding those with a thick, woody centre in the neck., , , , , , The skin should be bright and shiny., , If you notice dark, powdery patches under the skin, pass it up as this is an indication of a common mould which will eventually spoil the flesh., , Avoid those that are sprouting or have signs of mould., , In addition, onions of inferior quality often have soft spots, moisture at their neck, and dark patches, which may all be indications of decay., , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , For the batter of cabbage pancakes, , , , , , , , , , For the batter of cabbage pancakes recipe | Indian vegan cabbage pancakes | healthy mini cabbage pancakes | cabbage besan chilla quick Indian snack, , Add 1 cup, grated cabbage, . in a deep bowl., , , , , , Add 1/2 cup, besan (bengal gram flour), ., , , , , , Add 1/4 cup finely, chopped onions, ., , , , , , Add 1 tsp finely, chopped green chillies, ., , , , , , Add 1/2 tsp, turmeric powder (haldi), ., , , , , , Add 1/2 tsp, cumin seeds (jeera) powder, ., , , , , , Add 1/2 tsp, ginger (adrak) paste, ., , , , , , Add 2 tbsp finely, chopped coriander (dhania), ., , , , , , Add, salt, to taste., , , , , , Add approx. ½ cup water.
